item.title: The Supreme Court Will Also Decide the Election
item.description:
When the Supreme Court rules on ObamaCare, it will define Barack Obama as either a winner or loser.
James Carville says overturning ObamaCare would be the best thing that could happen to Democrats. I think he’s wrong. ObamaCare is the centerpiece of Obama’s term in office. He put all of America’s business on hold for a year to pass it. He coerced, lied, intimidated, and threatened to get the law passed.
